tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE resource_allocation (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    laptop_id INT,
    software_license_id INT,
    allocation_date DATE,
    allocation_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE resources (
  resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_name VARCHAR(255),
  resource_type VARCHAR(255),
  employee_id INT,
  allocation_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_employee FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
	employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	first_name TEXT NOT NULL,
	last_name TEXT NOT NULL,
	department TEXT,
	allocated_laptop_id INT,
	allocated_license_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE laptops (
	laptop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	brand TEXT NOT NULL,
	model TEXT NOT NULL,
	owner_id INT,
	status TEXT,
	remaining_battery_life INT
);

CREATE TABLE software_licenses (
	license_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	software_name TEXT NOT NULL,
	license_key TEXT NOT NULL,
	number_of_licenses INT,
	assigned_to_employee_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE laptops (
  laptop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  laptop_model VARCHAR(50),
  laptop_serial_number VARCHAR(20),
  assigned_employee_id INT,
  remaining_warranty_months INT
);

CREATE TABLE employee_allocation (
  allocation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  laptop_id INT,
  license_id INT,
  allocation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE laptop_allocation_log(
    log_id UUID,
    laptop_id UUID,
    allocation_date TIMESTAMP,
    deallocation_date TIMESTAMP,
    employee_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE license_allocation_log(
    log_id UUID,
    license_id UUID,
    allocation_date TIMESTAMP,
    deallocation_date TIMESTAMP,
    employee_id UUID
);
